Title: Saaho
Writer: Sujeeth (screenplay), Sujeeth (telugu dialogue), K.G.R Ashok (tamil dialogue), Abbas Dalal (hindi dialogue), Hussain Dalal (hindi dialogue)
Actors: Prabhas, Shraddha Kapoor, Jackie Shroff, Neil Nitin Mukesh
Plot: An undercover cop becomes embroiled in a battle with warring criminals who want to acquire a "black box," their ultimate key to a treasure.
Language: Telugu, Tamil, Hindi, Malayalam, English, Japanese, Spanish, French, Punjabi
